document.heading: Carry's Way and Guethler's Court Designation Act of 2016
To designate the alley in Square 1042 between D and E Streets, S.E., in Ward 6, as Carry's Way and the alley in Square 1042 between 13th and 14th Streets, S.E., in Ward 6, as Guethler's Court.

history.summary: Law 21-152 designates the 16-foot wide alleyway that runs north and south between D Street, S.E., and E Street, S.E., in Square 1042 in Ward 6 as Carry's Way. Incorporates Bill 21-342.

document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Carry's Way and Guethler's Court Designation Act of 2016".

section.text: Pursuant to section 401 of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01) ("Act"), and notwithstanding sections 403, 406, 407, and 408 of the Act (D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.03, 9-204.06, 9-204.07 and 9-204.08), the Council designates the alley in Square 1042 that runs north and south between D Street, S.E., and E Street, S.E., in Ward 6, as "Carry's Way".

codify:street-designation-anno.action: the Council designates the alley in Square 1042 that runs north and south between D Street, S.E., and E Street, S.E., in Ward 6, as "Carry's Way

section.text: Pursuant to section 401 of the Street and Alley Closing and Acquisition Procedures Act of 1982, effective March 10, 1983 (D.C. Law 4-201; D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.01) ("Act"), and notwithstanding sections 403, 406, 407, and 408 of the Act (D.C. Official Code §§ 9-204.03, 9-204.06, 9-204.07, and 9-204.08), the Council designates the alley in Square 1042 that runs east and west parallel to D Street, S.E., and E Street, S.E., in Ward 6, as "Guethler's Court".

codify:street-designation-anno.action: the Council designates the alley in Square 1042 that runs east and west parallel to D Street, S.E., and E Street, S.E., in Ward 6, as "Guethler's Court

para.text: The name designated pursuant to section 2 shall be the official name of the alley described in that section and the name designated pursuant to section 3 shall be the official name of the alley described in that section.
For the purposes of this act, the term "official name" means the legal designation of the alley for mailing address and other official purposes.
Update relevant records of the District of Columbia to reflect the official names of the alleys, including:
Fire and Emergency Medical Services Department records;
Homeland Security and Emergency Management Agency records;
Any other record of the District of Columbia used for way finding or address purposes;
Notify the United States Postal Service, other relevant government agencies, and relevant private sector entities of the official names of the alleys; and
Install signage indicating the official names of the alleys using procedures established by the District Department of Transportation, and remove any signs with a previous name.

section.heading: Transmittal.
section.text: The Council shall transmit a copy of this act, upon its effective date, to the Mayor, the District Department of Transportation, and the Office of the Surveyor.

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement in the committee report as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code §1-301.47a).

section.heading: Effective date.
section.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto), a 30-day period of congressional review as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code §1-206.02(c)(1)), and publication in the District of Columbia Register.
